alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 6:09AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Sierra, northeastern Luna and west central Dona Ana Counties through 700 AM MDT... At 609 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Nutt, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hatch, Leasburg, Rincon, Jornada Range, Radium Springs, Dona Ana, Uvas Valley, Portions of Jornada Experimental Range, Hill, Northeast Las Cruces, Fort Selden State Historic Site, and Leasburg Dam State Park. This includes Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 10 and 31, and near mile marker 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
